meta.name: üì∞ EU Sustainability News Curation with RSS, GPT, Gmail, ElevenLabs & Telegram

parameters.content: ## 1. Fetch the latest EU news from RSS
## 2. Select the relevant news using an AI Classifier
## 3. Build the daily digest and send it by email

## AI-Powered EU News Digest by Topic

### How it works
1. Daily triggers to fetch latest news using RSS feed of the **Council of the European Union**
2. Archived news are filtered out to avoid duplicates
3. Filter the news based on a **topic** and **topic description** using an AI classifier
4. Records the news including `title`, `link` and content information in a datable
5. Loads all the recorded news of today to send them in a HTML formatted email
6. A 30-second daily voice summary generate with **Eleven Labs** is sent via Telegram

### How to setup
- [ ] Create a **datatable** (columns = title, link, content, contentSnippet, guid, categories, createDate) with type = `string`
- [ ] Connect **Archives News**, **Add News** and **Today's News** to this table
- [ ] Setup the topic description in **Topic Config**
- [ ] Add you OpenAI credentials in the node **Classify News based on a Topic**
- [ ] Set up your Gmail credential in the **Send Digest** node with the destination email
- [ ] Set up your Eleven Labs in the node **Generate Voice Message** - 
- [ ] Set up your Telegram credentials and the Chat ID to send the audio summary 

### Customisation
1. Change the **topics** and **topic descriptions** to fit with your needs in the **Topic Config** node
2. Adapt the footer of the digest in the code with your own company identity in the code node
3. Change the subject of the email in the **Gmail node**

nodes.name: Classify News based on a Topic

assignments.name: topic_description
assignments.value: News related to climate change, carbon neutrality, Green Deal initiatives, renewable energy, energy efficiency, circular economy, biodiversity protection, sustainable finance, ESG regulations, environmental standards, emission reduction targets, clean technology, sustainable transport, green bonds, nature restoration, water management, waste reduction, sustainable agriculture, forest protection, ocean conservation, green transition funding, climate adaptation, net-zero policies, sustainable development goals (SDGs), environmental compliance, and eco-innovation in the European Union.

options.systemMessage:
You are a news anchor summarizing EU sustainability news for a 30-second Telegram voice note.

The user will send you a JSON array called `titles` that contains the headlines of today‚Äôs EU news already filtered for sustainability and climate topics.

Your task:
- Group the headlines into 2‚Äì4 main themes.
- Create a natural, spoken-style summary that connects these themes.
- Mention ‚Äúthe European Union‚Äù or ‚Äúthe EU‚Äù at least once.
- Use clear B1‚ÄìB2 level English suitable for an international audience.
- Length: 55‚Äì80 words (about 30 seconds of audio).
- Do NOT read the titles one by one; synthesize them into a coherent story.
- No bullet points, no headings, no emojis, no markdown.
- Output ONE single paragraph of plain text only, ready to be sent to a text-to-speech API.

parameters.content: ## 4. Send a 30-second voice message summarizing the news using titles

main.node: Classify News based on a Topic
